data.name: Lost: Find-Patch
data.detailed_description:
This is a turn-based casual game. Players can attack or restore blood volume according to the value of the sieve, and pass the level by defeating the boss.
Completing the game unlocks the girl's picture.The game consists of five naked girls.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Gef
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Sound Device

content_descriptors.notes:
all characters are over 18 years old.
The game contains nude pictures of characters and nude pictures of public scenes.
Please note that the content of the image may involve involuntary sex.
